[Code of Ordinances](https://library.municode.com/tx/oak_ridge_north/codes/code_of_ordinances)

Requests for new services may be made in person, by fax, or by email. Services will be connected when a Utility Service Application for residential and commercial utilities is completed and the service deposit is paid. This agreement is required by the TCEQ and every customer must sign this agreement before the city can establish service.  A copy of your driver's license is required. There is a deposit for water and trash service and for trash service only. If service to an existing connection has been terminated or suspended, the city will not re-establish service unless it has a signed copy of this agreement. Services cannot be provided until all information and deposits are received.

Residents in the 77386 zip code must call Entergy for electric service and/or maintenance. Contact
[CenterPoint Energy HERE](https://www.centerpointenergy.com/en-us/residential?sa=ho)
.

Residents in the 77385 zip code may choose their electric power provider or contact
[ENTERGY HERE](https://www.entergy-texas.com/)
.
Natural Gas
CenterPoint Energy Entex provides natural gas to the entire City.  To initiate services please contact CenterPoint by clicking this
[LINK](https://www.centerpointenergy.com/en-us/residential/services/natural-gas/?sa=ho)
.

Street lights in the City of Oak Ridge North are owned and maintained by Entergy and Centerpoint. You can report an outage to them directly by clicking here or by calling them directly at 1-800-Entergy. The City would also be happy to submit it for you as a courtesy. Please call City Hall for this service.

[REPORT ENTERGY OUTAGE](https://www.myentergy.com/s/reportoutage)

[REPORT CENTERPOINT OUTAGE](https://www.centerpointenergy.com/en-us/residential/customer-service/electric-outage-center/report-streetlight-outages?sa=HO)

Collection in Oak Ridge North
The city contracts with Waste Management of Houston to manage and operate its solid waste collection and disposal services.

Residential Customer Service Center - 800-800-5804 or
[customerservices-satexas@wm.com](mailto:customerservices-satexas@wm.com)

Household garbage AND Recycling are collected every Thursday. Please have your waste at the curb by 7:00 AM. Household waste and yard waste are collected at the curb and is limited to the City of Oak Ridge North trash cart.

IMPORTANT: The waste collection will be limited to the City of Oak Ridge North trash cart- no additional bags unless tagged. If you have extra trash, tags can be purchased from City Hall. You can also purchase additional trash cans if necessary.

Place your carts on the right side of your drive by 7:00 AM.  Please do not leave your carts at the curbside on non-pickup days.

[Trash Guidelines](https://www.oakridgenorth.com/_files/ugd/2e573f_c1f3ecca842e4fa69d170dd91a1b5e88.pdf)
[Recycle Information](https://www.oakridgenorth.com/_files/ugd/5afa0d_afbd72d6c5ab4477a095da4c4caf2dbc.pdf)
[NEW](https://www.oakridgenorth.com/_files/ugd/2e573f_cdd74dd836f841a79415a25a2d2ed55e.pdf)



Monday - Thursday: 7:30 am - 4:30 pm

Fridays: 8:00 am - 4:00 pm

Closed Saturday & Sunday
